article: If you're not making great progress  in learning English, maybe it is because you have not kept a balance  between input  and output . For some people, the problem is _ , because they don't do enough reading. Some people seldom listen to English. They go to school, but do not read books _ class. I _ my students if  they watched English TV programs often. Most of them shook  their _ . It's terrible. Learning English should be a happy thing to do, _ many students find it hard because of so many new words, so many grammar rules and exercises. _ reading, try not to read anything in your mother language. For listening, _ your favorite English TV programs. You can record  the program you want to watch and watch them in your _ time. All the time you should spend more time listening to music. As for output, you need to find chances to _ English. The most important learning rule is learning by doing. Learning English is the same.
